title: Ardour 8.0 Open-Source DAW Released with Launchpad Pro Support, Region Grouping
description:
Ardour 8.0 open-source and cross-platform DAW (Digital Audio Workstation) is now available for download as a major release that introduces new features, support for new devices, and many improvements.

The post Ardour 8.0 Open-Source DAW Released with Launchpad Pro Support, Region Grouping appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
